nodes.text: Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker (Studio Fun International)
Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker is a canon children's book adaptation of the film of the same name. It was published by Studio Fun International on February 9, 2021.
Join Rey, Finn, Poe, and all their Resistance friends as they take their final stand against the First Order.

In the 2019 film, Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker, the Resistance must do everything it can to stop Supreme Leader Kylo Ren from ruling the galaxy. Join Rey, Finn, Poe, and all their friends as they take their final stand against the First Order in this retelling of the film. Star Wars fans of all ages will enjoy reliving the Skywalker saga in this beautifully illustrated storybook.
